column5: The abandoned church of St Botolph’s at Skidbrooke has gained a modern reputation as a “paranormal paradise, ” with ghost-hunters claiming sightings of a monk and other strange phenomena. Rumours of occult rituals, odd lights, and nighttime gatherings have turned the isolated site into a contemporary legen
The Grimsby Imp is a modern offshoot of the famous Lincoln Imp tale, said to be the mischievous companion who escaped to Grimsby Minster before being spanked by an angel and turned to stone

An ancient laurel with a dramatically twisted trunk and outstretched, mist-dancing branches—resembling a robed witch at dawn—has long captured photographers’ imaginations and inspired local folklore as a haunting symbol of the forest.
